title: Mother tongue. No. 3. Reading and writing
creator_credit: George Inger, Eileen Molony and British Broadcasting Corporation
brief_description: Part of a series providing an insight into the stages by which young children from birth to 11 years old learn to use, understand, read and write their own language. Deals mainly with the introduction of writing as part of general language development.
